name: gitstatusbg
description: VS Code extension that sets the background color of the editor to indicate the Git status of the file.

gitstatusbg.untrackedFileBackground.description: The tint color to use for the background of untracked files. Ensure the opacity is low to avoid obscuring text.

gitstatusbg.modifiedFileBackground.description: The tint color to use for the background of modified files. Ensure the opacity is low to avoid obscuring text.

gitstatusbg.behindRemoteFileBackground.description: The tint color to use for the background of files that have a modified remote version. Ensure the opacity is low to avoid obscuring text.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
